question.xref: DES s6, HC r238, KYTS p56
question.text: The road outside this school is marked with yellow zigzag lines. What do these lines mean?

explanation.text: Parking here would block the view of the school entrance and would endanger the lives of children on their way to and from school.

answer.text: You may park on the lines when dropping off schoolchildren
You may park on the lines when picking schoolchildren up
You must not wait or park your vehicle here at all
You must stay with your vehicle if you park here
